answer: Coveo's ML relevance ranking combines user behavior signals with content features to continuously optimize search results【1】. The platform's Automatic Relevance Tuning (ART) leverages click-through data to refine rankings over time, ensuring high-intent content surfaces first【2】.

sources.label: Coveo Documentation – Relevance Ranking (PDF, p. 4)
sources.excerpt: Coveo combines static, dynamic, and contextual ranking factors. Page 4 details how machine learning re-orders search results based on user behavior.

sources.label: Coveo Blog – Harnessing AI for Search (Mar 15 2024, Section: ART)
sources.excerpt: Automatic Relevance Tuning analyzes clicks and queries to adjust ranking weights, promoting content that best meets user intent.
